net.jxta.content
Class ContentProviderEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      net.jxta.content.ContentProviderEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ContentProviderEvent
extends EventObject

ContentProvider event object containing information related to the event being published.

See Also:

Method Detail

getContentProvider

public ContentProvider getContentProvider()
Get the ContentProvider which produced this event.

Returns:
the originator of this event

getContentID

public ContentID getContentID()
Get the ContentID of the Content to which this event pertains, if applicable. Note that this is only used when the event itself deals only with one particular Content.

Returns:
Content ID

getContentShares

public List<ContentShare> getContentShares()
Get the list of ContentShare objects associated with this event, if applicable.

Returns:
list of content shares

isLastRecord

public Boolean isLastRecord()
Gets the flag indicating whether or not this event is the last in a series of events from this provider.

Returns:
true if it is the last record, false if it is not, or null if not specified
